title: Naomi Osaka, Omarosa and Whoopi, T.I. Nicki Cardi B., Hurricane Florence, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Tommy VS Junior, Bruno and Prince, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Naomi Osaka, Omarosa and Whoopi, T.I. Nicki Cardi B., Hurricane Florence, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Tommy VS Junior, Bruno and Prince, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Today the show opens with a shout out to Naomi Osaka. Omarosa is on The View and Whoopi Goldberg asks a specific question. T.I. cosigns Cynthia Nixon from Sex in the City. Nicki Minaj speaks about her incident with Cardi B. Hurricane Florence is close to the Carolinas and Virginia. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Tommy VS Junior. A Georgia charter school is thinking of bringing in an old school form of discipline. The Cleveland Browns game had admissions coming from the NFL Senior VP of Officiating. Bruno Mars may play Prince in Netflix’s upcoming movie about the “Purple One.” Closing Remarks talks about removing the toxins from your life and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
